name: Kawai Slender (jonslayer0)
description:
"Kawai" Slender like... (Version 1.0.0.0)

New things + Fixes:

  • Animated campfire
  • Better flashlight (press F to turn on/off)
  • Cinematic (only when playing new game)
  • Fixed pause menu (press P)
  • Fixed textures on foliage/trees.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"Kawai" Slender like... (Version 0.1.0.0)

My first game made using Unreal Engine 4 (Characters made with MakeHuman and terrain and other assets with Blender).

Software :

  • Unreal Engine 4 (https://www.unrealengine.com/en-US/blog)
  • MakeHuman (http://www.makehuman.org/)
  • Blender (https://www.blender.org/)
  • Format Factory (http://www.pcfreetime.com/formatfactory/index.php)

Credits :

  • Jean Charpentier (Youtube channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCC8mKcruXFI-LuaiNqpXpOA ; Itchio : https://jeancharpentier.itch.io/ ) for the tutorials for Unreal Engine and the game idea.
